adrFormatAddress: 111 Murray St, New York, NY 10007, USA

originalText.text: Jason and his team are amazing! Without hesitation, they are able to deal with our crazy schedule, and accommodate our EVERY need! Not only is POOCHi reliable and easy to reach, but they are beyond friendly and kind!! Their GPS tracked walks, pictures they send, and comments they leave letting me know how the overall walks went, are above and beyond what I could have ever expected! There are so many options in the city when it comes to dog walkers, and choosing the right people, and company, can be daunting, but I know for a fact that I made the right choice with POOCHi, and I know our pup agrees too!!

originalText.text:
Jason and the Poochi team are amazing.  We recently picked up our first dog, a Bernese Mountain Dog puppy in April and were very anxious about using a dog walking service.  We spent an extensive amount of time interviewing different people and then came across Poochi.  The entire experience with Poochi was extremely professional, from our initial meeting with Jason to the updates we regularly receive from the team of unbelievable animal lovers.  Poochi does a great job communicating with detailed walk reports and pictures in the app which I regularly checked while at work.

The Poochi team was integral in raising our puppy and I HIGHLY recommend them to anyone that wants top-quality service.

originalText.text:
POOCHi is an excellent dog walker and I couldn’t recommend them enough. They make the scheduling process so easy and their app is great and user friendly. I love how I can chat directly with the dog walker on it and I get alerts with pictures and a report card after every walk. I trust them completely and am very glad I started using them.

Jason, the owner is reliable and professional and caters to all of me and my dog’s needs. Try them out, you won’t be disappointed !!

text.text:

I love how I can chat directly with the dog walker on it and I get alerts with pictures and a report card after every walk. I trust them completely and am very glad I started using them.

Jason, the owner is reliable and professional and caters to all of me and my dog’s needs. Try them out, you won’t be disappointed !!

originalText.text: We have been using Poochi for 2 months now and couldn’t be happier! Jason and his team of trained walkers and trainers are so loving, knowledgable and their communication is outstanding! The app that they use is so user friendly with GPS tracked walks, loads of pictures from each walk and a full written report card each time. My puppy Wallie has so much fun with them throughout the day while I am at work that I never feel guilty. He’s always jumping for joy (literally) when he sees them and they are doing a fabulous job on training him on the leash, elevator etiquette, tricks ect reinforce everything we work on with him at home. Jason has given us amazing recommendations as Wallie has grown through all stages of his life which has been really helpful as well. Love Poochi so much, look nowhere else!

originalText.text: I feel so lucky and grateful that my little doggy is a part of the Poochi family!  He loves all his walkers and is so well taken care of while I am not home.  I do the puppy program and it is perfect for training.  I also used Poochi for an weekend stay when I was away and it was amazing and I would definitely use them any time I travel.  I love the app that describes your dogs walk with pictures and a map of where he walked! I look forward to the messages that come after every walk!  I have been a dog owner for a long time and this is the best dog care service I have experienced! I can not recommend Poochi enough!
